document.topic_text: Posted by Grace Rodaje on August 22, 2016 · Leave a Comment Join our FREE Investment Literacy Seminar and learn what mutual funds can do for you. Bring along your friends, colleagues & relatives. Come and be financially knowledgeable! Attendance is F R E E so book your seats now! Date: August 25, 2016 (Thursday) Title: Basics on Personal Finance & Mutual Fund Presentation Venue: First Metro Investors Center Cebu; G/F Metrobank Plaza Bldg., Fuente Osmena Blvd. Cebu City Contact Details: Landline 032-520-6958 / 5696 ; Mobile: 0998-965-8247 Time: 5:30 PM to 7:00 PM Attendance is free but seats are limited! Book your seat today by clicking here:
